entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
